ai-mil3.5.2:1.2_0: “Venerable Sir, you are the supreme Buddha.”
ai-mil3.5.2:1.4_0: “Sir, how do you know that the supreme person?”
ai-mil3.5.2:1.5_0: “What do you think, great king? Are the ocean’s worthwhile, which would be more fruitful and beneficial for the ocean?
ai-mil3.5.2:1.6_0: the Ganges, Yamunā, Aciravatī, Sarabhū, or Mahī.”
ai-mil3.5.2:1.8_0: “In the same way, I understand that great king, having seen such a disciple, the Universal Sāketa is supreme.”
ai-mil3.5.2:3.1_0: it is the second enquiry of the Buddhas.
